dt: {bc}in an {d_link|insane|insane} manner {bc}in a way that suggests unsoundness or disorder of mind

dt.t: They sometimes gabbled {wi}insanely{/wi}. One huge man was asking of the sky: "Say, where de plank road? Where de plank road!" It was as if he had lost a child.
Glancing back, he saw all the carnage, death and misery he had caused in his career. The big rat laughed {wi}insanely{/wi} and ran faster: on and on, past scenes of desolation and destruction …
Justin Bieber … took to Instagram to show off the {wi}insanely{/wi} expensive Audemars Piguet diamond watch he purchased for her as a birthday gift …

shortdef: in an insane manner : in a way that suggests unsoundness or disorder of mind
